meta.title: Example systematic review on X
meta.note: This is a sample structured abstract payload for UCC PRISMA pipeline.

sections.Background: We investigated X to understand Y.
sections.Methods: We searched A/B/C databases, screened N records, and synthesized K studies.
sections.Results: The pooled findings suggest Z with heterogeneity across contexts.
sections.Conclusions: X may improve Y under constraints; further research is required.
